name: Daily Commute
description:
This is a parody of arcade drag-racing genre. Two buses race towards next bus stop and first to reach it wins. The twist is that track length is always different, and speeding buses need long time to stop safely... Supports two player split-screen for most fun.

Original Ludum Dare version can be found here:

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=p...

This is game was originally made for ludum dare 34 game jam. I hope You will like it!

Made by Jakub Miksa
